title: Twitter says Threads stole its IP, sends legal threat to Facebook parent Meta
description:
Twitter has sent a legal warning to its competitor Meta, Semafor said on July 6. Meta — the parent company of Facebook and Instagram — previously launched its Threads app. The product has been widely described as Twitter competitor or “Twitter killer,” something that Twitter itself has taken note of. Alex Spiro, a lawyer for […]

The post Twitter says Threads stole its IP, sends legal threat to Facebook parent Meta appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BRICS Nations Eye New Global Currency: A Potential Threat to the US Dollar
description: The Chief Financial Officer of the New Development Bank of the BRICS economic coalition indicated a “medium to long-term ambition” to establish a new global currency, potentially rivaling the US dollar in a recent interview. The alliance, formed by Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa, is reportedly looking to enhance direct trade in their […]
